neuro is abandoned:
Neuro gets abandoned due to tech issues ):
Abandoned in this case refers to the tech issues persisting for at least 2 minutes.
turtle spotted: A turtle is spotted on the stream. This does not include if Vedal shows up or on signs
shark spotted: A shark is spotted on the stream. This does not include on signs
eel spotted: An eel is spotted on the stream. This does not include on signs
bodyguard speaks: The bodyguard is heard audibly on stream
bodyguard helps: The bodyguard helps Toma with something such as carrying stuff, tech issues, etc. This does not count if the bodyguard has to defend Toma
enters gift shop: Toma and Neuro enter the gift shop
jellyfish spotted: A jellyfish is spotted on the stream. This does not include on signs
